name: Movenpick Grand Al Bustan Dubai
description: Located just 5 minutes from Dubai International Airport, Mӧvenpick Grand Al Bustan Dubai is a world-class 5-star hotel featuring modern and luxurious rooms and suites, 7 dining options offering a unique variety of international cuisines, state-of-the-art leisure facilities including; a temperature-controlled outdoor swimming pool and a children’s pool, squash courts, tennis courts and a massage room offering an extensive range of spa treatments and an extensive range of meetings and events facilities. Guest Rooms and Suites | 279 in total, all of our guest rooms and suites are equipped with modern amenities including; a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, tea/coffee facilities, and luxurious bathroom amenities. Some rooms offer direct access to the swimming pool and guests can enjoy relaxing on the deck located on the 1st floor of the hotel. Leisure Facilities | Featuring state-of-the-art fitness facilities, comfortable sun loungers and sunshades, floodlit tennis courts, a swimming pool, steam and sauna rooms, and an outdoor jacuzzi. Get pampered with a range of revitalizing massages at the spa. Dining | Embark on a culinary journey at our award-winning restaurants that deliver an unrivaled choice of cuisines and something for every mood. Movenpick Grand Al Bustan is the go-to dining destination featuring some of the most popular restaurants in the city. Why settle for one type of cuisine when you can feast on a range of gastronomic delights from around the globe? The choices are truly endless, from International, Arabic, Thai and Japanese cuisine. If you are looking for something light, the poolside, Anees Pool Bar offers light-bite snacks and drinks, and Gazebo located in the lobby of the hotel offers a selection of cold and hot beverages and a range of tasty homemade-style and delicious sandwiches and cold and hot bites. Meetings and Events | The hotel also features an extensive meetings and events venues with a capacity of over 1500 guests. Whether its a meeting for 15 delegates or a conference for up to 1500, we have 3,500 square metres of flexible meeting and event spaces perfect for any type of event. Our Rashidiya Grand Ballroom is one of the largest ballrooms in the city and can successfully host exhibitions, business events, conferences, meetings, seminars weddings, and social gatherings. The Location | The renowned Dubai Creek is an only 10-minute drive away from the hotel, while the famous Dubai Gold Souk and Spice Souk are 15 minutes away. Major shopping malls including Deira City Centre, Dubai Festival City Mall, Dubai Mall, and Burj Khalifa and Mirdif City Centre are within a 15-minute drive from the hotel. Garhoud is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, sightseeing and shopping.

address_obj.address_string: Casablanca Road Al Garhoud, Dubai Airport, Dubai 30880 United Arab Emirates

amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center
